message.content:
1. The interval time for the first analgesic request was measured.
2. The interval time for the first analgesic request for the case group was 23.1 minutes.
3. The standard deviation of the interval time for the first analgesic request for the case group was 6.7 minutes.
4. The interval time for the first analgesic request for the control group was 18.1 minutes.
5. The standard deviation of the interval time for the first analgesic request for the control group was 7.3 minutes.
6. A comparison was made between the interval times for the first analgesic request of the case group and the control group.
7. The difference in the interval times for the first analgesic request between the case group and the control group was statistically significant (P = 0.02).

messages.content:
Statement: The interval time for the first analgesic request was 23.1 ± 6.7 minutes for the case group and 18.1 ± 7.3 minutes for the control (P = 0.02).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
